SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) AS CNT FROM SH_QBBS WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{q_keyword}||'%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{q_keyword}||'%'
AND ID=#{q_keyword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SH_QBBS (SEQ, ID, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, WDATE, PARENT, REF, STEP, DEPTH, REGDATE, DEL) VALUES(SH_QBBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE, 0, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF), 0)+1 FROM SH_QBBS), 0, 0, SYSDATE, 0)
